language.description: It's good to go higher! Play Ninja Up now!
language.txt_ground: before the ground wanted to say hello.
language.txt_ninja: before running into some ninja trouble.
language.txt_ufo: before going on vacation to another planet.

language.description: Bay cao thật đã! Chơi Ninja Up ngay!
language.txt_tutorial: Hãy vẽ một đường để bắt đầu.
language.txt_crane: trước khi bị cần trục làm bất tỉnh.
language.txt_ground: trước khi mặt đất muốn nói lời chào.
language.txt_ninja: trước khi lâm vào vài rắc rối ninja.
language.txt_ufo: trước khi đi nghỉ ở hành tinh khác.

language.description: C'est bon d'aller toujours plus haut ! Joue à Ninja Up !
language.txt_crane: avant de souffrir d'une commotion cérébrale.
language.txt_ground: avant que le sol veuille te dire bonjour.
language.txt_ninja: avant de te heurter à un problème de ninja.
language.txt_ufo: avant de partir en vacances sur une autre planète.

language.caption_1: Ich habe gerade in Ninja Up
language.description: Es ist gut, Höheres zu erreichen! Spiele jetzt Ninja Up!
language.txt_crane: gesprungen, bevor dir ein Kran eine Gehirnerschütterung verpasst hat.
language.txt_ground: gesprungen, bevor du auf den Boden der Tatsachen zurückgekehrt bist.
language.txt_ninja: gesprungen, bevor du Ninja-Ärger bekommen hast.
language.txt_ufo: gesprungen, bevor du auf einem anderen Planeten Urlaub gemacht hast.

language.description: ¡Aún más alto! ¡Juega ahora a Ninja Up!
language.txt_crane: antes de sufrir una conmoción cerebral.
language.txt_ground: antes de que a la tierra le diese tiempo de decir hola.
language.txt_ninja: antes de meterte en problemas ninja.
language.txt_ufo: antes de irte de vacaciones a otro planeta.

language.description: Sempre più in alto! Gioca a Ninja Up!
language.txt_crane: prima di fare un piccolo incidente con una gru.
language.txt_ninja: prima di incappare in un ninja-guaio.
language.txt_ufo: prima di andare in vacanza su un altro pianeta.

language.description: É sempre bom subir mais! Jogue Ninja Up agora!
language.txt_crane: antes de sofrer um traumatismo craniano.
language.txt_ground: antes de dar de cara no chão.
language.txt_ninja: antes de dar de cara com o perigo ninja.
language.txt_ufo: antes de sair de férias para outro planeta.

language.description: Yükseklere çıkmak güzeldir! Şimdi Ninja Up oyna!
language.txt_ufo: ve sonunda başka bir gezegende tatile çıkmak zorunda kaldın.

language.description: Чем выше, тем лучше! Сыграйте в Прыг-скок Ниндзя!
language.txt_ninja: и столкнулись с типичными для ниндзя проблемами.

language.description: Melompatlah lebih tinggi! Mainkan Ninja Up sekarang!
language.txt_crane: sebelum mengalami benturan dengan alat berat.

language.txt_share: แชร์คะแนนของคุณเลย:
language.txt_youjump: คุณกระโดดได้
language.caption_1: ฉันเพิ่งกระโดดได้
language.description: ยิ่งสูงยิ่งดี! เล่น Ninja Up เลย!
language.txt_tutorial: ลากเส้นเพื่อเริ่ม
language.txt_crane: ก่อนจะปะทะเข้ากับเครนก่อสร้าง
language.txt_ground: ก่อนที่พื้นดินจะทักทายคุณ
language.txt_ninja: ก่อนที่จะวิ่งชนเข้ากับปัญหานินจาบางอย่าง
language.txt_ufo: ก่อนจะไปพักร้อนที่ดาวเคราะห์ดวงอื่น

language.description: 跳越高越好！立即暢玩《Ninja Up》吧！
language.txt_crane: 然後撞到起重機造成腦震盪

language.description: 人总要往高处走的！现在就来玩Ninja Up吧！
language.txt_crane: 然后遭遇了塔吊的撞击
language.txt_ninja: 然后卷入了忍者的麻烦事
language.txt_ufo: 然后去别的星球度假了
